scripts.docker-up: npm run docker-up-account && npm run docker-up-product && npm run docker-up-message
scripts.docker-down: npm run docker-down-account && npm run docker-down-product && npm run docker-down-message
scripts.cis: npm ci && npm run ci-account && npm run ci-image && npm run ci-product && npm run ci-message && npm run ci-userapp && npm run ci-adminapp && npm run ci-moderatorapp
scripts.installs: npm install && npm run install-userapp && npm run install-adminapp && npm run install-moderatorapp && npm run install-account && npm run install-image && npm run install-product && npm run install-message
scripts.lints: npm run lint-account && npm run lint-image && npm run lint-product && npm run lint-message && npm run lint-userapp && npm run lint-adminapp && npm run lint-moderatorapp
scripts.tests: npm run test-account && npm run test-image && npm run test-product && npm run test-message && npm run test-userapp && npm run test-adminapp && npm run test-moderatorapp
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run account" "npm run image" "npm run product" "npm run message" "npm run userapp" "npm run adminapp" "npm run moderatorapp"
scripts.dev-userapp: concurrently --kill-others "npm run account" "npm run image" "npm run product" "npm run message" "npm run userapp"
scripts.dev-adminapp: concurrently --kill-others "npm run account" "npm run image" "npm run product" "npm run message" "npm run adminapp"
scripts.dev-moderatorapp: concurrently --kill-others "npm run account" "npm run image" "npm run product" "npm run message" "npm run moderatorapp"
